rows.label: tev016001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Bernat about the laborers in the industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Bernat if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Bernat about the recently discovered xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask Bernat for his opinion of
the xenoforms living in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Bernat about the state of the war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016002_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Bernat about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0001
rows.name:
Most of the physically capable young folk end up
joining BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0002
rows.name:
As a result, there's a real shortage of laborers to do
construction work in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0003
rows.name:
When they said they found 10 new crew members,
we thought they'd send at least one of them our way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0004
rows.name:
But besides you, we haven't seen hide nor hair of
any of 'em! What the hell is going on?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, regardless, if you get disillusioned with BLADE,
know that we'd be happy to have you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0006
rows.name:
You could help us build the industrial district of
tomorrow using good, honest manual labor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0021
rows.name:
You mean those Prone? I hear they have BLADE blood
on their hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0022
rows.name:
Depending on what happens, we may need to go to
war with their kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0023
rows.name:
How ironic. We drop in on this planet uninvited,
and now WE might be the ones invading another
world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0024
rows.name:
It's awful, when you think about it. But if that's the
way it's gotta be, then that's the way it's gotta beâ€”
because Mira is all we have left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0025
rows.name:
Even if they tell us to get the hell off their planet,
where else would we go? We gotta fight to keep Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0040
rows.name:
You say xenoforms, and I think of the bastards that
destroyed Earth. I figured they were all that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0041
rows.name:
But the xenoforms that came to this city are...
Well, they have quirks, but they're an interesting bunch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0042
rows.name:
As we've been losing a lot of BLADEs over the course
of time, the city's grown quieter. It's kinda nice to have
so much energy back in New LA again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0057
rows.name:
A lot of BLADEs have been cut down by Ganglion
gunfire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0058
rows.name:
It's true that we may be able to bring them back if we
find the Lifehold Core...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0059
rows.name:
But there's no guarantee that we'll find it before the
rest of us kick the bucket.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0060
rows.name:
If it comes down to it, I'm ready to go down fighting
in my mimeosome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG0061
rows.name:
You just tell me when things get bad, okay? I'll go
straight from the construction site to the battlefield![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG1001
rows.name:
We're building again, and that means doing my own
job while also teaching Rock the basics of construction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG1002
rows.name:
He seems pretty excited about getting to the point
where he could build a house for him and Celica.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG1003
rows.name:
He's a quick study. If he keeps working hard,
I think he's got the makings of a good builder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG1004
rows.name:
That's still a ways off though. Ryo just wants him to get
to the point where he can draw a workable blueprint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016001_MSG1005
rows.name:
If he does that, we'll all chip in and build the place
for him.[ST:wait ]
